summary: The Order of the Companions of Honour is an order of the Commonwealth realms.
full_text: The Order of the Companions of Honour is an order of the Commonwealth realms. It was founded in June 1917 by King George V as a reward for outstanding achievements in the arts, literature, music, science, politics, industry, and religion. It is sometimes regarded as the junior order to the Order of Merit.
title: Order of the Companions of Honour
